entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO SOUTH 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
